Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Copy the resource to another place. For files, also siblings can be created.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Move the resource - where moving it inside a folder is the same as renaming. Note that the relationship engine takes care that links to the resource do not break when you move it.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Delete the resource. Note that the resource is still availabe online until the deleted resource is published. Therefore, deleted resources are only striked out and not removed in the explorer view of the offline project until they are published.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Reset the offline version of the resource to the online version, loosing all unpublished changes.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Upload another file that replaces the current one.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: View and change permissions set for the resource
